message.raw: Added query for OGRE's plugindir variable, which is defined in its .pc file.  This allows us to remove the Ubuntu-specific hacks regarding finding OGRE and its library/plugin directories.  As far as I can tell, OGRE.pc should always have the right values for libdir and plugindir.
message.html: Added query for OGRE's plugindir variable, which is defined in its .pc file. This allows us to remove the Ubuntu-specific hacks regarding finding OGRE and its library/plugin directories. As far as I can tell, OGRE.pc should always have the right values for libdir and plugindir.
